description: Table showing Department for Communities and Local Government Contribution towards DFG for the years 2000/01 to 2008/09, Local Authority Regional Housing Pot Capital Allocations for the years 2006/07 to 2009/10 and planned expenditure on mandatory disabled facilities grants reported in the financial years 2000/01 to 2008/09. 3 p.
department: Dept for Communities and Local Government
